text: Altice USA is an American cable television provider. It is headquartered in New York City. It delivers pay television, Internet access, telephone services, and original television content to approximately 4.9 million residential and business customers in 21 states. It was founded in 2016. It is the fourth-largest cable provider in the U.S. Category:American telephone companies Category:American internet service providers Category:American television providers Category:Companies based in New York City Category:2016 establishments in the United States
title: Altice USA
